ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( $RecordType.Name = "ABS Order", Total_ABS_Revenue__c >= 15000, ISPICKVAL(Leased__c, "No"),
OR(
ISPICKVAL(ABS_Order_Request_Type__c, "New"), ISPICKVAL(ABS_Order_Request_Type__c, "Maintenance: New"), ISPICKVAL(ABS_Order_Request_Type__c, "Maintenance: Auto-Renew")),
OR(
ISBLANK(Federal_Tax_ID__c), ISBLANK(Company_Officer__c)))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Company Officer Name and Federal Tax ID fields are required for this order.
